trans-unit.source: Represents an Active Directory role in a Windows Workflow Foundation hosting environment.
trans-unit.target: Representerar en Active Directory-roll i Windows Workflow Foundation värdmiljö.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Den här klassen kan inte ärvas.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Typically, the Active Directory store is used for storing organizational information for personnel.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Active Directory-Arkiv används vanligtvis för att lagra organisationsinformation för personal.

trans-unit.source: The main purpose for the ActiveDirectoryRole is for making queries against such organizational information for business reasons.
trans-unit.target: Det huvudsakliga syftet för ActiveDirectoryRole är för att göra frågor mot sådana organisationsinformation för affärsskäl.

trans-unit.source: Active Directory roles typically correspond to a job function, title, or job skill within the context of the organization.
trans-unit.target: Active Directory-roller motsvarar vanligtvis en arbetsuppgift, avdelning eller jobb kunskaper inom ramen för organisationen.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref> that contains all the roles that report to the current role either directly or indirectly.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar en <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref> som innehåller alla de roller som rapporterar till den aktuella rollen direkt eller indirekt.

trans-unit.source: GetAllReports returns all nodes below the current node.
trans-unit.target: GetAllReports returnerar alla noder under den aktuella noden.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetDirectReports%2A> to return only the nodes that are directly below the current node.
trans-unit.target: Använd <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetDirectReports%2A>att returnera endast de noder som är direkt under den aktuella noden.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetDirectReports%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref> that contains all the roles that either directly or indirectly report to the current role.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref> som innehåller alla de roller som antingen direkt eller indirekt rapporterar till den aktuella rollen.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref> that contains all the roles that report directly to the current role.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar en <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref> som innehåller alla de roller som rapporterar direkt till den aktuella rollen.

trans-unit.source: GetDirectReports returns only the nodes that are directly below the current node.
trans-unit.target: GetDirectReports returnerar endast de noder som är direkt under den aktuella noden.

trans-unit.source: To return all nodes below the current node use <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetAllReports%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Om du vill returnera alla noder nedan använder den aktuella noden <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetAllReports%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetAllReports%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref> that contains all the roles that directly report to the current role.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref> som innehåller alla rollerna som direkt rapporterar till den aktuella rollen.

trans-unit.source: Returns the generic collection that contains all <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> objects associated with the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar den allmänna samlingen som innehåller alla <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> objekt som är associerade med aktuellt <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A role can be a general collection of security objects.
trans-unit.target: En roll kan vara en allmän uppsättning säkerhetsobjekt.

trans-unit.source: As such, a role can contain multiple identities, for example use GetEntries to return all directory objects associated with the role.
trans-unit.target: Som en roll innehåller flera identiteter, till exempel använda GetEntries för att returnera alla katalogobjekt som är associerade med rollen.

trans-unit.source: The generic <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> collection that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Allmän <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> samling som är associerad med aktuellt <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a generic list of the Windows NT accounts associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar en allmän lista över Windows NT-konton som är associerade med den <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: GetIdentities obtains all <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier> objects associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> and converts each of them into a string value.
trans-unit.target: GetIdentities hämtar alla <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier>objekt som är associerade med den <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole>och konverterar dem till ett strängvärde.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> </xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier>

trans-unit.source: A generic list of values that represent the Windows NT accounts associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En allmän lista med värden som representerar de Windows NT-konton som är associerade med den <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns an Active Directory role that contains information about the manager of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar en Active Directory-roll som innehåller information om hanteraren för aktuella <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: GetManager returns the direct manager for the current role.
trans-unit.target: GetManager returnerar hanteraren direkt för den aktuella rollen.

trans-unit.source: To return all roles above the current node, use <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetManagerialChain%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Om du vill returnera alla roller ovanför den aktuella noden, använder du <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetManagerialChain%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetManagerialChain%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref> that contains information about the manager of the current role.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref> som innehåller information om hanteraren för den aktuella rollen.

trans-unit.source: Returns the Active Directory role that contains information about the managerial chain associated with the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar rollen Active Directory som innehåller information om verkställande kedjan som är associerade med aktuellt <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: GetManagerialChain returns all nodes above the current role.
trans-unit.target: GetManagerialChain returnerar alla noder ovanför den aktuella rollen.

trans-unit.source: To return just the direct manager of the current role, use <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetManager%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Om du vill returnera bara använda hanteraren direkt för den aktuella rollen <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetManager%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetManager%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref> that contains information about the managerial chain associated with the current role.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref> som innehåller information om verkställande kedjan som är associerade med den aktuella rollen.

trans-unit.source: Returns an Active Directory role that contains information about all the directory operations that are supervised by the manager of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar en Active Directory-roll som innehåller information om alla directory-åtgärder som övervakas av hanteraren för aktuella <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> returned contains information from all objects managed by the manager of this role but does not contain this information from the current role.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole>returneras innehåller information från alla objekt som hanteras av hanteraren av den här rollen, men innehåller inte den här informationen från den aktuella rollen.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref> that contains information about all directory operations that are supervised by the manager of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref> som innehåller information om alla katalogåtgärder som övervakas av hanteraren för aktuella <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a generic list of <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"></xref> objects associated with the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar en allmän lista över <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"> </xref> objekt som är associerade med aktuellt <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: GetSecurityIdentifiers checks each <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> returned by the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetEntries%2A> method to see if the entry has a security identifier in its <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Properties%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: GetSecurityIdentifiers kontrollerar alla <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>returneras av den <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetEntries%2A>metod för att se om transaktionen har en säkerhetsidentifierare i dess <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Properties%2A>samling.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Properties%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetEntries%2A> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> has such a property, GetSecurityIdentifiers adds a <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier> to the list it returns.
trans-unit.target: Om den <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>har en egenskap, GetSecurityIdentifiers lägger till en <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier>i listan som returneras.</xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>

trans-unit.source: A generic list of <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"></xref> objects associated with the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En allmän lista över <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"> </xref> objekt som är associerade med aktuellt <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref> contains the specified identity.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar ett värde som anger om den <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref> innehåller det angivna identitet.

trans-unit.source: Because a role is a generalization of one or more objects, many identities may be described by a single role.
trans-unit.target: Eftersom en roll är en generalisering av ett eller flera objekt, kan många identiteter beskrivas med en enda roll.

trans-unit.source: Use IncludesIdentity to test that a specified identity is included within this role.
trans-unit.target: Använda IncludesIdentity för att testa en viss identitet ingår i den här rollen.

trans-unit.source: The identity for which to search.
trans-unit.target: Det identitet som ska eftersökas.

trans-unit.source: to indicate that identity is included in the ; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: som indikerar att identity ingår i den , annars .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Active Directory role name.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger namnet för rollen Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Use the name to describe the role.
trans-unit.target: Använda namn som beskriver rollen.

trans-unit.source: The Active Directory role name.
trans-unit.target: Rollnamnet Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Gets the root Active Directory node associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar rotnoden för Active Directory som är associerade med den <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The root entry is the role up the chain of roles that has no manager.
trans-unit.target: Rot-posten är rollen upp i kedjan för roller som har inga manager.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> that represents the root Active Directory node associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> som representerar roten Active Directory-nod som är associerade med den <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Frigör alla resurser som används av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> with the data required to serialize the target object.
trans-unit.target: Fyller på en <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> med de data som krävs för att serialisera målobjektet.

trans-unit.source: The implementation of <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData%2A> allows this object to be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Implementeringen av <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData%2A>gör det här objektet ska serialiseras.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> att fylla i med data.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> destination for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>mål för den här serialisering.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>
